SRIJAN AGARWAL

Hi, I'm a Web Developer and computer engineering student at Amrita University, Amritapuri Campus. Currently a WikiToLearn Core Developer and Outreach Lead at ThinkFOSS.

I'm on Twitter @srijancse and GitHub @srijancse. You can also email me at srijan@wikitolearn.org. My public key is 2416 141C BCC1 397B.

My interests are Open Source, Web Applications, Machine Learning, and Big Data. I mostly code in JavaScript and PHP. Check out my resume!
